examples.example: 他的努力超过了所有人的想象，最终取得了巨大的成功。

translate.english: His efforts exceeded everyone's imagination and finally achieved great success.

examples.example: 他在这次比赛中的表现超过了以往任何一次，令人惊叹不已。

translate.english: His performance in this competition exceeded any previous one, which is amazing.

examples.example: 我的进步超过了自己的预期，这让我倍感振奋。

translate.english: My progress has exceeded my own expectations, which makes me feel extremely excited.
